Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Enums
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.MessageBuilder
    since 2.0. Use TypedMessageBuilder as returned by Producer.newMessage() to create a new message builder.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.ClientConfiguration
    Use PulsarClient.builder() to construct and configure a new PulsarClient instance
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.ConsumerConfiguration
    Use PulsarClient.newConsumer() to build and configure a Consumer instance
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.ProducerConfiguration
    use PulsarClient.newProducer() to construct and configure a Producer instance
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.ReaderConfiguration
    Use PulsarClient.newReader() to construct and configure a Reader instance
  • Deprecated Enums 
    Enum and Description
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.ProducerConfiguration.HashingScheme
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.ProducerConfiguration.MessageRoutingMode
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.MessageRouter.choosePartition(Message<?>)
    since 1.22.0. Please use MessageRouter.choosePartition(Message, TopicMetadata) instead.
    org.apache.pulsar.client.impl.auth.AuthenticationTls.configure(Map<String, String>)
    org.apache.pulsar.client.impl.auth.AuthenticationDisabled.configure(Map<String, String>)
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.Authentication.configure(Map<String, String>)
    This method will be deleted on version 2.0, instead please use configure(String encodedAuthParamString) which is in EncodedAuthenticationParameterSupport for now and will be integrated into this interface.
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.PulsarClient.create(String)
    use PulsarClient.builder() to construct a client instance
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.PulsarClient.create(String, ClientConfiguration)
    use PulsarClient.builder() to construct a client instance
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.PulsarClient.createProducer(String)
    use PulsarClient.newProducer() to build a new producer
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.PulsarClient.createProducer(String, ProducerConfiguration)
    use PulsarClient.newProducer() to build a new producer
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.PulsarClient.createProducerAsync(String)
    use PulsarClient.newProducer() to build a new producer
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.PulsarClient.createProducerAsync(String, ProducerConfiguration)
    use PulsarClient.newProducer() to build a new producer
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.PulsarClient.createReader(String, MessageId, ReaderConfiguration)
    Use PulsarClient.newReader() to build a new reader
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.PulsarClient.createReaderAsync(String, MessageId, ReaderConfiguration)
    Use PulsarClient.newReader() to build a new reader
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.ClientBuilder.enableTls(boolean)
    use "pulsar+ssl://" in serviceUrl to enable
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.ProducerConfiguration.getMessageRouter(int)
    since 1.22.0-incubating. numPartitions is already passed as parameter in MessageRouter.choosePartition(Message, TopicMetadata).
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.Producer.send(Message<T>)
    since 2.0. Use TypedMessageBuilder as returned by Producer.newMessage() to create a new message builder.
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.Producer.sendAsync(Message<T>)
    since 2.0. Use TypedMessageBuilder as returned by Producer.newMessage() to create a new message builder.
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.PulsarClient.subscribe(String, String)
    Use PulsarClient.newConsumer() to build a new consumer
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.PulsarClient.subscribe(String, String, ConsumerConfiguration)
    Use PulsarClient.newConsumer() to build a new consumer
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.PulsarClient.subscribeAsync(String, String)
    Use PulsarClient.newConsumer() to build a new consumer
    org.apache.pulsar.client.api.PulsarClient.subscribeAsync(String, String, ConsumerConfiguration)
    Use PulsarClient.newConsumer() to build a new consumer
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.apache.pulsar.client.impl.PulsarClientImpl(String, ClientConfiguration)
    org.apache.pulsar.client.impl.PulsarClientImpl(String, ClientConfiguration, EventLoopGroup)
    org.apache.pulsar.client.impl.PulsarClientImpl(String, ClientConfiguration, EventLoopGroup, ConnectionPool)
